title: Civilization III & IV.iso
description:
Sid Meier's Civilization III & Iv Complete Edition

Sid Meier's Civilization III: The Complete Edition delivers an addictive, open-ended gameplay filled with unique challenges where the fate of a player is totally up to him or her and the outcome is never known. Put all this in a historical context and you have the complete experience.

Sid Meier's Civilization IV: The Complete Edition is the ultimate strategy game, offering players the chance to lead their chosen nation from the dawn of man through the space age and become the greatest ruler the world has ever known. Civilization IV: The Complete Edition includes the original strategy classic, plus the two expansion packs and the standalone game Colonization in one box, for one incredible value.


Includes all the expansion packs for both games on 1 dvd. No disk needed to play once installed. Not hacked/cracked just a image of the actual DVD I bought. Load image into a image drive or burn the disk then install and play. Enjoy!
